title: Kate DiCamillo: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Flora and Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures
itunes:summary: Multiple Newbery Award winner Kate DiCamillo (The Tale of Despereaux, Because of Winn-Dixie) discusses her new novel, Flora and Ulysses: The Illuminated Adventures. DiCamillo tells her laugh-out-loud story in an exciting new format that mixes the novel with comics- style graphic sequences and full-page illustrations.
